title: Essar to invest $6.6 billion in power, port projects in Gujarat
description: Essar, built by brothers Shashi and Ravi Ruia, declared itself debt-free last year after it sold some of its assets in sectors including telecoms, oil refining and steel over the years to settle its $25 billion debt.
